Name: SHPR
About the game: SHPR is an arcade shooter, arena survival roguelike in which you have to choose items, create builds and synergies that will help you to defeat enemies and bosses to be able to pass to the next levels. GAMEPLAY Use your mouse to guide your character. Your character will shot automatically at the closest enemy. Get action points at the end of each level and when you are performing great. Use action points to buy new items or upgrade your existing ones. FEATURES 30+ items to choose from Unique enemies , each with a different set of characteristics Bosses with speacial abilities Modern, minimalist graphic style
